author: Getnews
title: Unlocking Full Spectrum Wellness with EMR TEK'sKryptonUV
text:
Unlocking Full Spectrum Wellness with EMR TEK'sKryptonUV 04-23-2025 11:44 PM CET | Industry, Real Estate & Construction
Press release from: Getnews / PR Agency: MK Digiworld
Introducing Krypton UV: Canada's Next Step in Light-Based Wellness
In a country where winter months can dim more than just the daylight, the Krypton UV arrives as a powerful ally in supporting year-round wellness. EMR-TEK, the Canadian brand already known for its innovation in red light therapy [ https://emr-tek.com/ ], has introduced a new kind of full-spectrum solution: one that includes the often-overlooked potential of UV light therapy [ https://emr-tek.com/collections/uv ].
Image: https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXfRYeSTnNEeGRlqHGiK9ZiFBw-mhp1BBwQjHDPconUV-1f1A8HkoExpsTLv_h4ApvVG3R69GTL7a5hYTbmtwLD_OJELf3Oe67BL5_VvYDTYStQPl4dtZ7BSFXTG_1F3wRov_Lsr?key=Wj5UctJGUbbjR9wc7fSBo0Ac
With the launch of the Krypton UV, EMR-TEK is inviting Canadians to experience wellness support through carefully engineered light exposure that fits seamlessly into any lifestyle.
What Sets Krypton UV Apart?Full-Spectrum LED Power
This device blends powerful wavelengths for a comprehensive at-home light therapy experience:
*
606W LED Power delivers high-intensity red and near-infrared light (630nm, 660nm, 810nm, 830nm)
*
Premium Philips UV Bulbs emit UVA and UVB light with therapeutic-grade precision
*
FDA-Approved UV Bulbs offer peace of mind for wellness-conscious users
Each wavelength is selected to support natural processes-helping users enhance their daily routine, recovery, and energy.
Designed for Durability and Comfort
*
3mm Tempered Glass Protection reduces the risk of injury
*
Electronic Ballasts ensure flicker-free lighting for a smooth, comfortable experience
*
PRO Series Electrical Upgrades deliver reliable, high-performance operation
The Krypton UV is more than a device-it's a long-term investment in self-care that delivers professional-grade results at home.
Why Canadians Are Turning to UV Light TherapyThe Rise of UVA and UVB in Daily Wellness
While red light has dominated the wellness conversation, UVA light therapy [ https://emr-tek.com/collections/uv/products/krypton-uv-500w-1400w ] and UVB are gaining attention for their supportive roles in:
*
Skin wellness
*
Seasonal mood enhancement
*
Daily rhythm and energy optimization
As Canadian winters bring extended darkness, interest in light-based solutions that mimic natural sunlight has surged.
Image: https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXcteqrq9Bs8FZZgbn94cB7LKVuSGhefENIgAcQtfXV-ed8UfoUrS6NFXS7rukZyWj92ChP6oS4kuhSbN0reWFZ7a1uImR8Zm19eYosVjof8kzXNGo03Tt72z5FOopFCi46kmlWIIQ?key=Wj5UctJGUbbjR9wc7fSBo0Ac
Who Is It For?
Whether you're a seasoned biohacker or just exploring light therapy, the Krypton UV is made for:
*
Biohackers seeking full-spectrum optimization
*
Wellness explorers building holistic routines
*
Busy professionals who want a convenient, effective tool
Built to Fit Real LivesCompact Power
This device doesn't compromise on strength, despite its manageable size:
*
Dimensions: 1.96 x 1.44 x 0.24 ft
*
Compact enough for home, powerful enough for clinics
*
Easy Bulb Replacement with detachable Philips bulbs
Aesthetic Meets Function
The sleek design of the Krypton UV ensures it fits naturally into any modern space-proving wellness devices can be both functional and beautiful.
Powered by Purpose: The EMR-TEK StoryA Founder's Vision
Kris, EMR-TEK's founder, didn't enter the light therapy world by chance. Diagnosed with vitiligo at an early age, he turned to UVB sessions for relief and recovery. This personal experience inspired a passion for accessible, high-performance wellness tech.
Continuing the Mission
The Krypton UV is the next step in EMR-TEK's journey, continuing its legacy of:
*
High-quality, research-driven design
*
Precision-engineered wavelength delivery
*
Affordable innovation that doesn't compromise on quality
A Brighter Wellness Future
With the Krypton UV, EMR-TEK is once again setting a new standard in light therapy innovation. This is more than a device-it's a signal of where wellness is headed.
Whether you're optimizing performance, maintaining balance during the winter, or simply adding intentionality to your self-care routine, EMR-TEK's UV light therapy [ https://emr-tek.com/collections/uv ] solutions are ready to support your goals.
Discover More:
*
Learn about UVA light therapy and how it supports everyday wellness
*
Explore EMR-TEK's full UV light therapy product lineup
*
Dive deeper into the benefits of red light therapy for your routine
Media Contact

Email: Send Email [ http://www.universalpressrelease.com/?pr=unlocking-full-spectrum-wellness-with-emr-tekskryptonuv ]

author: Peter McGuire
title: CMP gets $425 million for Northern Maine power corridor | Maine Public
text: CMP gets $425 million for Northern Maine power corridor Central Maine Power’s parent company is in line to receive nearly half a billion dollars from the federal government to build a 111-mile power line in Northern Maine. The U.S. Department of Energy award is contingent on Avangrid [winning a state contract to build transmission](https://www.mainepublic.org/business-and-economy/2024-05-14/maine-utility-regulators-are-restarting-the-process-of-building-renewable-energy-in-northern-maine) that connects potential wind farms in Aroostook County to the regional grid. The money is part of the Biden administration’s push to develop new energy sources, said CMP spokesperson Jon Breed. It's one of the biggest federal investments in Maine energy development to date. "Unlocking new renewable energy in different parts of the country is critical and transmission is the way to do it," Breed said. The Maine Public Utilities Commission earlier this year restarted a bidding process to generate and transmit 1.2 megawatts of clean power, called the Northern Maine Renewable Energy Development Program. Regulators [terminated a similar proposal ](https://www.mainepublic.org/environment-and-outdoors/2023-12-21/maine-public-utilities-commission-nixes-aroostook-powerline-contract)last year over concerns about project cost and land impacts. But the $425 million award could help solve the cost issues and Avangrid plans to build on existing power corridors, Breed said. "At this point we don’t intend to use eminent domain like was discussed previously on the past project we can largely do this with areas we control," he said. The award would help cover the cost of building a new substation in Haynesville and a high-capacity transmission line that connects to an existing substation in Pittsfield, according to the energy department's grid deployment office. In a press release, Governor Janet Mills applauded the unprecedented funding that "has the power to transform the energy future of northern Maine." "By expanding our transmission infrastructure, this investment can make the electric grid more stable and reliable and allow us to harness affordable, clean energy generated right here in our own backyard instead of having to import expensive and harmful fossil fuels from out-of-state," Mills said. Maine Public’s Climate Desk is made possible by Androscoggin bank, with additional support from Evergreen Home Performance, Bigelow Laboratory, & Lee Auto Malls.

organizations.name: Northern Maine Renewable Energy Development Program

author: Emilee Coblentz
title: BlendJet 2 recall: 4.8 million blenders pulled over safety concerns
text: BlendJet recalls nearly 5 million blenders after reports of property damage, injuries [Emilee Coblentz](https://www.usatoday.com/staff/6093189001/emilee-coblentz/) Portable blender maker [BlendJet](https://blendjet.com/) is voluntarily [recalling](https://www.usatoday.com/recalls/) nearly 5 million of its BlendJet 2 blenders following reports of property damage and injury accrued due to the product overheating. In addition to those reports, 329 complaints were received of the blades breaking while in use, according to a [warning issued Thursday](https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2024/BlendJet-Recalls-4-8-Million-BlendJet-2-Portable-Blenders-Due-to-Fire-and-Laceration-Hazards) by the Consumer Product Safety Commission, from which one laceration injury was documented. Consumers also reported $150,000 in property damage as a result of the 17 instances of the units overheating, some resulting in house fires. Nearly 50 cases of minor burns were reported as well. Though the CPSC urges consumers to stop using these blenders immediately, the [company states](https://blendjet.com/safetyandrecall) that BlendJet 2's currently for sale are safe to use and not impacted by this recall. Search USA TODAY's recall database: [Publicly available recall data, including consumer products, food, drug and automotive](https://www.usatoday.com/recalls/) Is my BlendJet 2 recalled? A variety of colors and designs of the recalled BlendJet 2 units were sold from October 2020 through November 2023 at Costco, Walmart, Target and other stores nationwide and on [BlendJet's website](https://blendjet.com/). The affected blenders are 9.5 inches by 3 inches, 1.5 pounds and retailed between $50 and $75. To know if your blender is recalled, check the serial number printed at the bottom of its base. If the first 4 digits are between 5201-5542, that product may be subject to recall. To confirm, you can enter your serial number on [BlendJet's site](https://snlookup.blendjet.com/). If you want more information, you can go to [blendjet.com/safetyandrecall](https://blendjet.com/safetyandrecall). After doing so, if you have further questions, you can fill out [this form](https://blendjet.gorgias.help/en-US/contact) and select "Recall Information" from the dropdown menu. Replacements are available Free replacements are available through BlendJet. To receive one, the company asks that you remove and cut the rubber seal from the base of your blender in more than three pieces. Then, upload or email a photo that shows the product's serial number along with proof that the rubber seal has been destroyed. You can complete that process on the company's site at [ blendjet.com/safetyandrecall](http://www.blendjet.com/safetyandrecall) or email your proof to [safety@blendjet.com](mailto:safety@blendjet.com).

author: Omkar Godbole
title: O preço do Bitcoin (BTC) está em terreno instável? Os sinais de mercado refletem padrões que previram a recente queda nas ações da mídia Trump
text:
A distribuição de probabilidade implícita é distorcida para a esquerda, sugerindo expectativas de retração de preços. As ações da Trump Media passaram por uma dinâmica semelhante antes da recente queda de preço. Enquanto o preço do bitcoin (BTC) luta para garantir uma posição acima de US$ 90.000, os desenvolvimentos no mercado de opções listadas na Deribit vinculadas à Criptomoeda se assemelham aos padrões que prenunciaram a recente queda de preço nas ações da mídia Trump.
O padrão aqui mencionado é a distribuição de probabilidade implícita, representando as expectativas dos Mercados para o preço futuro do ativo subjacente derivadas de preços de opções em diferentes preços de exercício e datas de vencimento. Ela mostra as probabilidades que os traders atribuem ao ativo atingindo diferentes níveis de preço.
De acordo com dados rastreados pela plataforma financeira de Cripto BloFin, a distribuição de probabilidade implícita agora mostra um "deslocamento para a esquerda", sugerindo que os participantes do mercado veem uma probabilidade maior de o BTC ser negociado a preços mais baixos a partir de agora.
"Um indicador típico é a distribuição de probabilidade implícita: seja MSTR, COIN ou opções de BTC da Deribit, a distribuição de probabilidade implícita de diferentes datas de expiração mostrou uma mudança significativa para a esquerda", disse Griffin Ardern, chefe de negociação de opções e pesquisa na plataforma financeira de Cripto BloFin, ao CoinDesk em um chat do Telegram. "Parece que os traders têm um consenso implícito de que os preços do BTC e das altcoins ainda estão altos, e mais recuos podem estar a caminho."
Ardern acrescentou que uma mudança semelhante para a esquerda foi vista no mercado de opções da DJT, prenunciando a recente queda de preço. O preço das ações caiu pela metade para US$ 27 em pouco mais de duas semanas, de acordo com a plataforma de gráficos TradingView. A DJT subiu para uma alta de US$ 54 no final de outubro, enquanto os Mercados precificavam uma potencial vitória do candidato republicano Donald Trump na eleição dos EUA realizada em 5 de novembro.
Bem, o pró-criptomoedas Trump saiu vitorioso, como esperado, e desde então, o BTC subiu mais de US$ 20.000, chegando à marca de US$ 93.000 em ONE momento.
No momento em que este artigo foi escrito, a Criptomoeda foi negociada a US$ 88.100, de acordo com dados do CoinDesk .
Comentários agressivos dos funcionários do Fed apoiam o caso de uma retração de preço sugerida pela distribuição de volatilidade implícita. Na quinta-feira, o presidente Jerome Powell disse que a economia não está enviando nenhum sinal de que precisamos ter pressa para reduzir as taxas, frustrando as esperanças de uma flexibilização mais rápida da liquidez. Desde setembro, o Fed já cortou as taxas em 75 pontos-base, oferecendo sinais otimistas para arriscar ativos.
Dito isso, a maioria dos participantes do mercado continua otimista, fazendo apostas que lucrariam com um possível aumento de preço acima da barreira de US$ 100.000.
Editado por Parikshit Mishra.
